ROOT.QUERY: WITH WHS_RECEIVABLE AS (SELECT araseqvl, aracinr, aracexr, aracexvl, substr(foucnuf,3,5) arasite, to_char(MIN(araddeb), ''MM/DD/RR'') "Whs active since", to_char(MAX(aradfin), ''MM/DD/RR'') "Whs ended on" FROM artuc@heinens_custom_prod whsartuc, foudgene@heinens_custom_prod WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE) between araddeb and aradfin AND foucnuf IN (''H090061'',''H091070'', ''H091071'') AND aracfin=foucfin AND aratcde=2 /* Receivable */ AND aratfou=1 /* Main supplier */ AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM artrempl@heinens_custom_prod WHERE arrseqvlo=araseqvl AND arrdfin > TRUNC(SYSDATE)) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM artuc@heinens_custom_prod uc2 WHERE uc2.aracinr=whsartuc.aracinr AND uc2.araseqvl != whsartuc.araseqvl AND uc2.aradfin > TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND uc2.aratcde=1) GROUP BY araseqvl, aracinr, aracexr,aracexvl, substr(foucnuf,3,5)), WHS_RECEIVABLE_INFO AS ( SELECT arasite "Whs #", (SELECT ar_fourn || '' | '' || ar_nrsfou FROM tb_art@heinens_stk_prod WHERE ar_cproin=aracexr AND to_number(ar_ilogis)=arlcexvl AND ar_donord=arasite) "Supplier code desc.", aracexr || ''/'' || aracexvl || '' '' || pkartvl.get_vldesc@heinens_custom_prod(1,araseqvl,''HN'') "Item code desc.", "Whs active since", "Whs ended on", (SELECT arvcexv FROM artuv@HEINENS_CEN_PROD WHERE arlcinluvc=arvcinv) "SV #", pkartcoca.Get_Arccode@heinens_custom_prod(1,arlcinluvc) "UPC", NVL(ROUND((SELECT SUM(ul_nqtuvc/ (ul_nuvspc*ul_nspcca)) FROM TB_EUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD, TB_LCUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD WHERE UL_USSCC = UE_USSCC AND NVL(UE_INDFIC, ''1'') = ''1'' AND ul_donord=arasite AND ul_cproin=arlcexr AND ue_staums=0 AND to_number(ul_ilogis)=arlcexvl),0),0) "Whs inventory (case)" FROM WHS_RECEIVABLE, artvl@heinens_custom_prod WHERE arlseqvl=araseqvl ) SELECT * FROM WHS_RECEIVABLE_INFO WHERE NVL("Whs inventory (case)",0) > 0 ORDER BY "Whs #" ASC, to_date("Whs ended on", ''MM/DD/RR'') ASC
